name: unfroggetable
description:
A game about the unfroggetable frog Henry. Eat fireflies so you don't starve, but avoid the red nasty ones.

Hold space to aim

Release space to hop

Tab to pause

Hope you enjoy :)

Also, I had a little issue with Unity and the screen size. So after starting the game, u need to press the blue fullscreen button in the left corner, sorry :(
